description.value:
Starting when you choose this path at 3rd level, you emanate a stormy, magical aura while you rage. The aura extends 10 feet from you in every direction, but not through total cover.

Your aura has an effect that activates when you enter your rage, and you can activate the effect again on each of your turns as a bonus action. The aura whips up strong winds (20 miles per hour) in the aura that moves with you, remaining centered on you. The winds have the following effects:

  • It deafens you and other creatures in its area.
  • It extinguishes unprotected flames in its area that are torch-sized or smaller.
  • It hedges out vapor, gas, and fog that can be dispersed by strong wind.
  • The area is difficult terrain for creatures other than you.
  • The attack rolls of ranged weapon attacks have disadvantage if the attacks pass in or out of the wind.
  • Additional effect based on the environment you select below.

When you rage choose @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.class-and-subclass-features.Item.eBWMMh9KIap4nxMo]{Storm Aura: Desert}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.class-and-subclass-features.Item.OusvQpQ2NhxYecoF]{Storm Aura: Sea}, or @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.class-and-subclass-features.Item.dbpmLgFI9lzObTIf]{Storm Aura: Tundra}.

If your aura's effects require a saving throw, the DC equals 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Constitution modifier.
